session.goal: M5: Beta Launch — build, deploy, onboarding, feedback

changes.summary: M5 Beta Launch build tasks complete (M5-1 through M5-6). All changes committed (7821224) and pushed to origin/sandbox. Working tree clean. 247 tests passing, 0 TS/ESLint errors. 14 output chunks, largest 195KB/55KB gz. Awaiting Netlify deployment via dashboard (CLI blocked by EACCES).

files_modified.description: Vite manual chunks for vendor splitting (react, ui, data, google)
React.lazy code splitting, Suspense wrappers, runtime env logging, WelcomeOnboarding + FeedbackWidget integration
Netlify build config, SPA redirects, cache + security headers
Documents all 4 env vars (Google OAuth, Gemini, Supabase)
2-step onboarding: feature overview + Google connect, localStorage persistence
Floating feedback button + modal form (bug/feature/general), localStorage storage
React class ErrorBoundary wrapping all routes
M5 status IN_PROGRESS, M5-1 through M5-6 marked complete

decisions_made.decision: Vite manual chunks for vendor splitting
decisions_made.rationale: Separates rarely-changing vendor code for better caching

decisions_made.decision: Feedback stored in localStorage not RxDB
decisions_made.rationale: Avoids schema migration for transient beta data
First-time users should understand app before daily planning prompt
All work was on sandbox branch, not yet merged to master

next_immediate_step.details: User must connect monmacllcapp/daily-progress-tracker repo to Netlify, select sandbox branch. Set env vars: VITE_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID, VITE_GEMINI_API_KEY. netlify.toml auto-configures build.

next_three_steps.details: Share deployed URL with testers, provide test Google account
Monitor feedback entries, prioritize bugs vs features
Address critical bugs from beta testing

blockers: Netlify CLI blocked by EACCES in current env — deployment must be done via Netlify web dashboard or user's local machine
continuation.context_notes: All code committed (7821224) and pushed to origin/sandbox. Working tree clean. M0-M4 complete, M5 build tasks complete (6/10). M5-7 through M5-10 require deployment + real users. User test Gmail: monmaclabs@gmail.com. Full autonomy directive active.
